item.title: Create md5 from string im Linux
item.description: How to install? Create new file nano /usr/bin/md5 copy&paste code to /usr/bin/md5 chmod: chmod +x /usr/bin/md5 Code: #!/bin/sh if [ $1 ] then hash="$(echo -n "$1" | md5sum )" echo "$hash" else echo "Example usage: md5 <you-string>" fi Usage and Output: root@host:~# md5 sebastian c2d628ba98ed491776c9335e988e2e3b &#8211;

item.title: iptables simple ban ip rules
item.description: Ban an IP address (IP address cannot be entered on the server) # iptables -A INPUT -s 1.2.3.4 -j DROP Ban an IP address (cannot be accessed from the server on the IP) # iptables -A OUTPUT -s 1.2.3.4 -j DROP Delete Rule by Chain and Number # iptables -L --line-numbers # iptables -D INPUT 3 Flush a Single Chain Delete all of the rules in the INPUT chain, run this command

item.title: PHP Security - disabled the exec, etc.
item.description: In /etc/php5/apache2/php.ini as someone already can upload phpshell it will not do too much… disable_functions = exec, shell_exec, system, popen, passthru, escapeshellarg, escapeshellcmd, proc_close, proc_open, ini_alter, dl, popen, show_source, set_time_limit, php_uname, phpinfo, diskfreespace, disk_total_space, disk_free_space, get_current_user, posix_uname
